alert.note: Alert for Routt (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 03 at 11:35AM MDT until May 06 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Colorado... Elk River at Milner affecting Routt County. .Warm temperatures have accelerated snow melt across the high country of northwest Colorado. This is increasing flow on many tributaries of the Yampa River, with a forecast peak in river levels expected mid to late this week. Increased reservoir releases may also add additional flows to rivers. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Elk River at Milner. * WHEN...From this morning to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...flooding has been reported along portions of County Road 42 this morning. At 7.0 feet, lower portions of 42 Road near the Elk River Bridge start to flood. At 7.7 feet, water approaches homes on the south side of US40 near the confluence of the East Fork Elk River and the Yampa River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM MDT Wednesday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM MDT Wednesday was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 7.6 feet just after midnight tonight. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 7.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
